reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is an amazing professor! Her lectures are clear, and she's always willing to help outside of class.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Good professor with a deep understanding of the subject, but sometimes the lectures can be a bit fast-paced.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Very engaging lectures and thorough explanations. Highly recommend taking her classes.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: The material is challenging, and the exams are tough. Dr. Williams is knowledgeable but not very approachable.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Solid professor with clear lectures. Sometimes difficult to follow the labs, but overall a good experience.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Dr. Miller makes history come alive! His passion for the subject is contagious.

reviews.subject: Literature
reviews.review: Incredible professor who really cares about her students. Her feedback is always helpful.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Thought-provoking lectures, but sometimes difficult to grasp the concepts. Dr. Martinez encourages critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Very clear and concise in her teaching. Dr. Taylor is great at simplifying complex topics.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Great professor with a lot of real-world experience. Sometimes the lectures can be a bit dry.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson is very engaging and makes the subject matter interesting. Highly recommend!

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Good professor with interesting lectures. The exams can be tricky, so be prepared.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Rodriguez is passionate about the subject and it shows in her teaching. Excellent class!

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: The course is challenging, and Dr. Walker's teaching style is very technical. Not an easy class.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Dr. Lee is an outstanding professor. Her lectures are detailed and very well-organized.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Interesting subject matter, but sometimes the lectures are hard to follow. Dr. Hernandez is very knowledgeable.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Clark is an expert in her field. Her passion for art is evident in every lecture.

reviews.subject: Geography
reviews.review: Great professor with interesting lectures. Sometimes the assignments are a bit overwhelming.

reviews.subject: Music
reviews.review: Dr. King is a fantastic professor. Her love for music makes the class very enjoyable.

reviews.subject: Law
reviews.review: Challenging course with a lot of reading. Dr. Lopez is thorough but expects a lot from his students.
